mapper.select: SELECT ID, EMAIL, PASSWORD, NAME, DATE_FORMAT(REGDATE, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') AS REGDATE FROM MEMBER ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.insert: insert into member (email, password, name, regdate) values (#{email}, #{password}, #{name}, now())
mapper.update: update member set email = #{email}, name=#{name}, password=#{password} where id=#{id}
